findings.rationale: The absence of indemnification can expose parties to significant financial risks in case of legal claims arising from the agreement.
findings.evidence_quote: No indemnification obligations apply under this Agreement.

findings.rationale: Lack of audit rights limits the ability to verify compliance with confidentiality obligations, increasing the risk of misuse of confidential information.
findings.evidence_quote: No audit rights are granted under this Agreement.

findings.rationale: The three-year term may not provide adequate protection for long-term confidential information, potentially leading to exposure after expiration.
findings.evidence_quote: This Agreement shall remain in effect for three (3) years from the date of execution.
